ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4; The Fight For Law & Order
ComicInfo.Summary: When the secret of the leader of The Cavendish Gang is revealed, it’s up to Kato, now personally trained by the aged Tonto, to try to save The Green Hornet, The Lone Ranger, and possibly the world. But when death strikes the very heart of a family, can a family, itself, survive? Read “The Fight for Law and Order,” the heart-breaking 4th issue of 5 in “THE LONE RANGER MEETS THE GREEN HORNET: CHAMPIONS OF JUSTICE!”
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 22:12:18. [CVDB553034]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Bart, Eliot Ness, Kato, Lone Ranger, The Green Hornet, Tonto
ComicInfo.Teams: Native Americans, The Cavendish Gang, The Green Hornet and Kato
